name: api_utility_FrameTimingManager
description: Provides frame-level CPU and GPU time measurements.

properties.name: CaptureFrameTimings
properties.description: This function triggers the FrameTimingManager to capture a snapshot of FrameTiming's data, that can then be accessed by the user.

properties.name: GetCpuTimerFrequency
properties.description: This returns the frequency of CPU timer on the current platform. If the platform does not support returning this value it will return 0.

properties.name: GetGpuTimerFrequency
properties.description: This returns the frequency of GPU timer on the current platform. Currently always 1000000000.

properties.name: GetLatestTimings
properties.description: Allows the user to access the currently captured FrameTimings.

properties.name: GetVSyncsPerSecond
properties.description: This returns the number of vsyncs per second on the current platform, used to interpret timing results. If the platform does not support returning this value it will return 0.

properties.name: IsFeatureEnabled
properties.description: Check if frame timing statistics are enabled.
